knimeNode.name: Interactive Histogram
knimeNode.shortDescription: Displays data in a histogram view.

intro.p: Displays an interactive histogram view with different viewing options.

The user can change the following properties on the fly:
X axis
Aggregation column (Y axis)
Aggregation method (count, summary, average)
Number of bins for numerical attributes
The width of the bars
Shows empty intervals option
Shows missing value bar option
Zooming
Crosshair cursor
...

p.b: Please note: This node caches all data in the main memory to provide interactive functions.

ports.dataIn: The data table that should be displayed.
